alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 11:01PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pima County through MIDNIGHT MST... At 1057 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow from an area of thunderstorms in southwest Maricopa and Yuma counties, about 15 to 20 miles northwest of Ajo and moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph with brief blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust could briefly reduce visibilities below 2 miles. Locations impacted include... Ajo, Why and Gunsight. This includes the following highways... Route 85 between mile markers 33 and 58. Route 86 between mile markers 53 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument
